A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was fantastic.  There are few for hard fans who have read more novels\,played more or the games\, or have been immersed in the universe of star wars then me.  A lot will complain\, because the movie did not happen the way they thought it would\,should\,ought to go.  Do not listen to that trash!   This movie was an absolute masterpiece.  Everyone complained about the force awkens because they said it was a rehash of episode iv.  Now those same people are upset because Luke's story played out differently then how they imagined.   I was moved by this movie.  It was a emotional rollercoaster\, and I could not see the turns.  I never would have pictures this movie in my nerd ridden dreams.  That is why it is a masterpiece.   5 stars
